name: Sites Boundary
description: This element controls the boundary dimensions to be used for padding/margin styling for a given block

elements.helpText: The value for the top boundary
elements.label: Top

elements.helpText: The value for the bottom boundary
elements.label: Bottom

elements.helpText: The value for the left boundary
elements.label: Left

elements.helpText: The value for the right boundary
elements.label: Right

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
